Segment.name: W01
Segment.comment: To transmit basic and most frequent shipment-related line-item data elements

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: UPCCaseCode
Field.comment: Code (Universal Product Code - U.P.C.) including two high order digits identifying the "system" (U.S. Grocery = 00, 06 or 07; U.S. Drug = 03); using the U.S. Grocery system, the next ten digits are: Manufacturer (5) Case Code (5)

Field.name: ProductServiceIdQualifier1
Field.comment: Code identifying the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service ID (234)

Field.name: ProductServiceId1
Field.comment: Identifying number for a product or service

Field.name: ProductServiceIdQualifier2
Field.comment: Code identifying the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service ID (234)

Field.name: ProductServiceId2
Field.comment: Identifying number for a product or service

Field.name: FreightClassCode
Field.comment: Code indicating generalized classification that applies to one or more items in the shipment, i.e., class 70, 77.5, etc.

Field.name: RateClassCode
Field.comment: Code identifying specifically designated class of goods; Note: For international air shipments, see IATA Resolution 600k

Field.name: CommodityCodeQualifier
Field.comment: Code identifying the commodity coding system used for Commodity Code

Field.name: CommodityCode
Field.comment: Code describing a commodity or group of commodities

Field.name: PalletBlockAndTiers
Field.comment: Code indicating pallet and load structure; first three digits indicate the number of cases per layer, last three digits indicate the number of layers per pallet

Field.name: WarehouseLotNumber
Field.comment: Reference number assigned by the warehouse

Field.name: ProductServiceIdQualifier3
Field.comment: Code identifying the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service ID (234)

Field.name: ProductServiceId3
Field.comment: Identifying number for a product or service

SyntaxNote.name: R0304
SyntaxNote.comment: At least one of W0103 or W0104 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P0405
SyntaxNote.comment: If either W0104 or W0105 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P0607
SyntaxNote.comment: If either W0106 or W0107 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P1011
SyntaxNote.comment: If either W0110 or W0111 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P1516
SyntaxNote.comment: If either W0115 or W0116 is present, then the other is required.
